ComicInfo.Title: The Arc of Virooz, Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
There's a virus in GIR's head. This virus is mean, determined, and probably covered in spikes and stuff. Most importrantly, it's making GIR want to kill ZIM, and ZIM can't really let that happen. But the only way to destroy the virus is to travel inside GIR's broken robot mind, and the inside of GIR's broken robot mind is a virtual madhouse of crazy. PART TWO OF A FOUR-PART STORY!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Warren Wucinich | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Jey Odin | 2 | Note: The digital edition (9/6/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-04 23:18:43. [CVDB619660]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dib Membrane, GIR, Minimoose, Recap Kid, Zim
